author: ABC Radio National
title: Monday Finance with Ian Verrender
text:
Monday 6 July 2015 6:52AM   euro is falling against the dollar as Greece resoundingly rejects the austerity demands from its EU and IMF creditors. 
With the majority of the vote in Greece's historic referendum now counted, it's almost certainly a victory for the 'no' campaign, led by the anti austerity socialist Syriza Government. 
Athens says it will now go back to its creditors, armed with this result, and empowered to negotiate a better deal for Greece. 
ABC's Business Editor Ian Verrender joins Fran Kelly on RN Breakfast to preview the week ahead in business and finance.
